content: Youth Mentorship Program: weekly sessions for ages 13-18, focusing on academic support and life skills.
metadata: Program code: YMP-13to18, start date: 2025-01-10, coordinator: Alice Brown (COORD-1001)

content: Elderly Assistance Program: home visit support, medication reminders, light housekeeping help.
metadata: Program code: EAP-Senior, start date: 2025-02-01, coordinator: Bob Chen (COORD-2001)

content: Job Training & Placement: workshops on resume writing, interview prep, local job listings.
metadata: Program code: JTP-2025, start date: 2025-01-15, coordinator: Carol Lim (COORD-3002)

content: Homeless Outreach: daily meal distribution, shelter referrals, basic medical check-ups.
metadata: Program code: HO-Resources, start date: 2025-03-05, coordinator: David Parker (COORD-4001)

content: Family Counseling: group sessions focusing on communication and conflict resolution.
metadata: Program code: FC-Fam, start date: 2025-04-01, coordinator: Emily Stone (COORD-5001)
